description: This table contains Federal Poverty Level information from EAR masterfile.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the account record. This ID number could be encrypted if you have elected to implement enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption security function.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FPL_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The date from which this line of Federal Poverty Level information is effective.

columns.name: FPL_INCOME
columns.description: Total income for use in calculating Federal Poverty Level information.

columns.name: FPL_FAMILY_SIZE
columns.description: Family size for use in calculating Federal Poverty Level information.

columns.name: FPL_PERCENTAGE
columns.description: Calculated percentage of the Federal Poverty Level for this guarantor.

columns.name: FPL_STAFF_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of staff category ID for the person who collected this Federal Poverty Level information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FPL_INCOME_PRF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the method used by the guarantor to prove their income level.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FPL_STATUS_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the financial assistance status of a guarantor account. This only applies to guarantors that have their Federal Poverty Level form filled out.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FPL_REASON_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the financial assistance reason code associated with this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FPL_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The date until which this line of Federal Poverty Level information is effective.

columns.name: FPL_ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that collected this line of Federal Poverty Level information.

columns.name: FPL_USER_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department in which this line of Federal Poverty Level information was collected.

columns.name: FPL_INST_OF_ENTRY
columns.description: The date and time at which this line of Federal Poverty Level information was collected.

columns.name: INCOME_INTDIV
columns.description: Gross monthly income from interest and dividends.

columns.name: INCOME_PENSION
columns.description: Gross monthly income from pension.

columns.name: INCOME_ALIMONY
columns.description: Gross monthly income from alimony/child support.

columns.name: INCOME_SSI
columns.description: Gross monthly supplemental security income.

columns.name: INCOME_GOVT
columns.description: Gross monthly income from government assistance.

columns.name: INCOME_NON_WAGE
columns.description: Other gross monthly non-wage income.

columns.name: INCOME_HRLY_WAGE
columns.description: Hourly wage for gross monthly income calculation.

columns.name: HOURS_WORKED_WEEK
columns.description: Number of hours worked per week.

columns.name: OTHER_WAGES
columns.description: Other wages for use in calculating gross monthly income for use in calculating Federal Poverty Level information.

columns.name: SALARY
columns.description: Salary earned for use in calculating gross monthly income for use in calculating Federal Poverty Level information.
